title: Czech Republic: Citibank Clients Earned 200 Million Bonus Miles by Shopping Last Year
summary: Prague - Last year, Citibank credited 200 million miles to Citi CSA credit card holders under the Czech Airlines OK Plus loyalty program. Citibank clients could redeem these miles for the equivalent of 5,000 flights to Abu Dhabi or 10,000 flights around Europe. As part of a special campaign, new Citi CSA credit cards holders will get 50 percent off the annual fee for the first year.
tag-1: Czech Republic: Citibank Clients Earned 200 Million Bonus Miles by Shopping Last Year
tag-2: Prague – Last year, Citibank credited 200 million miles to Citi CSA credit card holders under the Czech Airlines OK Plus loyalty program. Citibank clients could redeem these miles for the equivalent of 5,000 flights to Abu Dhabi or 10,000 flights around Europe. As part of a special campaign, new Citi CSA credit cards holders will get 50 percent off the annual fee for the first year.
tag-3: "For every CZK 100 a cardholder spends using a Citi CSA credit card, he or she will earn four miles toward earning a Silver, Gold or Platinum OK Plus card, up to 15,000 miles per calendar year," said Veronika Španárová, Retail Bank Head at Citibank Czech Republic. "Since its launch in 2006, this credit card has continuously enjoyed great popularity with those clients who frequently fly for both personal and business purposes."
tag-4: Citi CSA credit cards offer clients a number of options to earn miles under the OK Plus program. For the first payment on their main card, cardholders earn an introductory bonus of 10,000 miles. Within the current promo campaign, they'll also earn the same mileage for the first CZK 5,000 paid using this card, whereas the standard requested amount equals to CZK 15,000. If cardholders spend a monthly average of at least CZK 15,000, these cardholders earn an extra annual bonus of 5,000 miles.
tag-5: "Since it began, the cooperation with Citibank in the area of cobranded credit cards brought Citi CSA credit card holders nearly half a billion miles in total to their accounts with the OK Plus loyalty program. This makes the project one of the most successful in the history of OK Plus," says Jirí Marek, Vice President of Sales and Marketing at CSA. "Both Citibank and CSA's experience and trust throughout our partnership has allowed us to deepen our cooperation, such that Czech Airlines began using other specific banking services provided by Citibank such as treasury operations and tax allowance in Kazakhstani Tenge for the company's branch in Almaty."
tag-6: The annual fee charged for Citi CSA credit cards is CZK 2,500, but Milan Reznícek, Credit Card Product Manager at Citibank, said, "In the next three months, from April to June, all new cardholders will be granted a special 50 percent discount on the annual fee for the first year."
tag-7: Citi CSA contactless credit cards offer a free option to take out family travel insurance and to register for assistance services, which comprise free bookings, delivery services and consultations, including legal, and over the telephone. Clients who golf can also check one golf bag free of charge on Czech Airlines operated flights. Contactless payment stickers are now being issued automatically at no charge, along with all new Citi CSA credit cards.
tag-8: Citi CSA cardholders can also enjoy all the other benefits offered by Citi credit cards, including an up to 55-day grace period and up to 25 percent off at Citi Club program partners throughout the Czech Republic, which specialize in everything from dining, shopping, travel, and sport to health & body care.
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
